articles.title: National Meeting Held
articles.content:
National Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held here Saturday to celebrate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il was present at the meeting.
					
					 Also present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Ri Yong Ho, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, members and alternate members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, delegates to the national celebrations of the 65th birthday of the WPK, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and  national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, former unconverted long-term prisoners who are pro-reunification patriotic fighters, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and art, public health and media, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs and working people. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, said in a report delivered at the meeting that President Kim Il Sung's founding of the WPK on Oct. 10, Juche 34 (1945) was a solemn declaration that heralded the birth of a new revolutionary party guided by the Juche idea and an event of a special mention which provided a firm guarantee for the Korean people to confidently advance along the path of sovereignty, independence and socialism under the leadership of the powerful political staff.
					
					 The WPK's history of revolutionary struggle is shining with the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by wisely leading the country and its people along the road of victory and glory, the reporter noted, and went on: 
					
					The WPK is the party of the President firmly based on his unitary ideological system, an ever-victorious party steering the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche and the mother party placing the people's wellbeing above anything else, deeply rooted among them. This is the true picture of the WPK which was built and has grown strong thanks to the outstanding ideas and leadership of 
						Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The history of the WPK is a history of victory as it has worked steady miracles, thanks to the leader believing in the people and them remaining loyal to him. 
					
					 The WPK firmly defended Korean style socialism despite the stern trial during the Arduous March, the forced march, laid a solid foundation for building a thriving nation and ushered in a heyday of great leap forward and prosperity of Songun Korea, Kim Il Sung's nation by giving full play to the indomitable mental power of all servicepersons and people. 
					
					 The WPK has firmly defended Korean style socialism, steadfastly following the road chosen by itself without the slightest vacillation despite unprecedentedly rigorous difficulties and trials under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, and successfully translated the people's ideal and desire for independence into a reality, the reporter noted, adding that this is the WPK's 65 year-long glorious history of struggle. 
					
					 He called for speeding up the building of a thriving socialist nation and bringing earlier national reunification and the final victory of the cause of Juche true to the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 He underscored the need to strengthen and develop the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung, holding him in high esteem as the sun of Juche for all ages and glorify the immortal exploits performed by the President and Kim Jong Il in building and leading the party generation after generation.
					
					 He declared that all Koreans would wage a vigorous struggle to meet the vicious challenge of the anti-reunification forces inside and outside Korea and foil their moves to ignite a war by their concerted efforts and achieve the independent reunification of the country under the banner of the north-south joint declaration and thus build a rich, powerful and prosperous reunified country on this land.
					
					 The WPK will continue to wage a dynamic struggle for protecting peace and stability in Asia and the rest of the world and accomplishing the human cause of independence, remaining true to the idea of independence, peace and friendship. 
					
					 Similar meetings took place in various provinces, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: "Arirang" Performance Given
articles.content:
"Arirang" Performance Given
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, was given at the May Day Stadium on Saturday to congratulate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed the performance.
					
					 Appreciating the performance were senior party, army and state officials, delegates to the national celebrations of the 65th birthday of the WPK, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, service persons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of scientific, educational, cultural and art and public health and media institutions, heroes and heroines, those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons of distinguished services and working people.
					
					 Also enjoying the performance were congratulatory groups, delegations and visiting groups of overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front, a delegation of the Communist Party of China on an official goodwill visit to the DPRK, the delegations and delegates of the groups for the study of the Juche idea, diplomatic envoys of foreign countries, representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 The performance began as letters reading "Greatest Homage to Great Leader, Founder of Our Party" and "Highest Glory to Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il" were presented in succession on the background and the ground turned into waves of flowers and sea of dancers.
					
					 The performance made a vivid representation of the 65 year-long history of the WPK and the history of victory and glory of Kim Il Sung's nation that made its majestic appearance on the international arena under the leadership of the great leader and the great party through dynamic and attractive gymnastic movements, beautiful and elegant art performance and ever-changing background scenes.

articles.title: Greetings from Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Greetings from Hu Jintao
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Saturday received a message of greetings from Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the C.C, the CPC and on my own behalf, extend warm congratulations to the C.C., the WPK on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, has a glorious revolutionary tradition.
					
					 The WPK has led the Korean people for a long period, making noticeable steady successes in the cause of socialist revolution and construction by overcoming difficulties through fortitude.
					
					 The WPK headed by you general secretary has led the Korean people true to the behest of President Kim Il Sung, steadily and actively exploring the path of development suited to the actual conditions of Korea and registering one joyful success after another in the efforts to accomplish the cause of building Korean style socialism over the last several years. 
					
					 We as a friendly neighbor, close comrade and genuine friend sincerely hope that the Korean people will continue to register fresh, greater successes in the historic course of building a thriving nation under the leadership of the WPK headed by you general secretary.
					
					 In recent years the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations have steadily grown stronger thanks to the utmost importance attached by the two sides to them and the joint efforts exerted by the peoples of the two countries and made important contributions to promoting the cause of socialist construction in the two countries.
					
					 The CPC sets great store by the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship and regards it as a consistent policy to steadily consolidate and develop the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation.
					
					 We will make joint efforts with the DPRK side and put impetus to the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relationship so as to steadily bring them on a fresh and higher level. 
					
					 It is our sincere wishes to see the WPK steadily develop and the Sino-DPRK friendship last generation after generation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the CPC, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Saturday.
					 On the occasion Zhou Yongkang expressed sincere thanks to the Korean comrades for their warm hospitality and extended warm congratulations to the WPK and the Korean people on the 65th birthday of the WPK on behalf of the Communist Party and the people of China.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the WPK and the people of the DPRK have gained great successes in their efforts for socialist construction true to the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that the Sino-DPRK friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung together with Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai is a traditional friendship forged in blood, adding that no one can break this.

articles.title: Reception Given for Chinese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Reception Given for Chinese Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday in honor of the delegation of the Communist Party of China on an official goodwill visit to the DPRK.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were head of the delegation Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the Communist Party of China, Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Sun Zhengcai, secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CPC, Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Qiu Yuanping, deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the C.C., the CPC, Zhang Zhijun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Chen Jian, vice-minister of Commerce, Chen Xi, deputy secretary of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the CPC, and Du Yuxin, deputy secretary of the Heilongjiang Provincial Committee of the CPC, who are members of the delegation and others, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Yong Sik, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, O Su Yong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Hi Thaek, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Song Gi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ku Pon Thae, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam said in his speech made at the reception that the DPRK-China friendship which stood all trials and tests of history is more favorably developing day by day under the deep care of the top leaders of the two parties and the two countries.
					
					 The Korean people are rejoiced over the great achievements made by the fraternal Chinese people in the socialist modernization drive with Chinese characteristics under the correct leadership of the CPC, he noted.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Chinese people would achieve greater successes in the work to build a harmonious socialist society by implementing the scientific outlook on development under the leadership of the CPC with Hu Jintao as general secretary.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to consolidate and develop the traditional DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations generation after generation, he stressed, adding:
					
					 We will continue strengthening mutual support and cooperation with the Chinese comrades in the efforts to accomplish the cause of socialist construction as intended by the top leaders of the two parties and the two countries and positively strive to keep the flower garden of the DPRK-China friendship beautiful.
					
					 Zhou Yongkang said in his speech that over the past 65 years the WPK has wisely led the Korean people to establish the regime in which they became masters and brought about a new phase in socialist construction of Korean style.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the hard-working and resourceful Korean people would achieve great successes in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the WPK headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and thus significantly greet 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship, the common treasure, provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two parties and the two countries, is growing strong as the days go by, he said.
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily boost the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, he noted, declaring that China would make positive efforts with the Korean comrades to develop the Sino-DPRK relations and achieve regional peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the CPC, arrived here Saturday to pay an official goodwill visit to the DPRK at an invitation of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It was greeted at the airport by Kim Yong Il, alternative member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Chinese Party Official Makes Public Written Speech
articles.content:
Chinese Party Official Makes Public Written Speech
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the Communist Party of China, made public a written speech at the airport Saturday upon his arrival in Pyongyang. 
					 In his speech he noted that the Workers' Party of Korea achieved independence of the country and liberation of the people weathering manifold obstacles in the spirit of self-reliance and hard efforts by leading the Korean people for the past 65 years and has achieved eye-opening successes one after another in accomplishing the cause of Korean-style socialist construction.
					
					 The recent successful Conference of the WPK elected the supreme leadership body and reelected General Secretary Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK, he noted, expressing belief that the WPK under the leadership of Kim Jong Il would open one fresh phase after another and achieve successes in the work to build a thriving nation, achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and improve foreign relations by leading the Korean people. 
					
					 It is not only honorable, sacred and historic mission but also the common steadfast policy to steadily boost the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship and bring bigger happiness to the peoples of the two countries, he stressed, and went on:
					
					 We believe that the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations would bring about the rosier future thanks to the deepest care shown by the top leaders of the two countries and the endeavors of the two parties, two countries and two peoples.
					
					 He expressed belief that his visit would certainly help deepen the feelings of friendship between the two parties, two countries and two peoples and accelerate the in-depth development of the Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the Communist Party of China, visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Saturday to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung.
					 It was accompanied by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the delegation of the CPC was laid before the statue of the President.
					
					 The participants paid homage to the President who strengthened and developed the WPK into a Juche-type revolutionary party and an ever-victorious iron-willed party and made immortal contributions to the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and China and the accomplishment of global independence. 
					
					 Zhou Yongkang made an entry into the visitor's book.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation Put Flowers on Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation Put Flowers on Friendship Tower
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the CPC, on an official goodwill visit to the DPRK, laid a wreath before the Friendship Tower on Saturday. 
					 Present there were Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Song Gi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai and his embassy officials.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the delegation of the CPC was laid before the tower.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the CPV who bravely fought on the Korean front and looked round the tower.
					
					 Zhou Yongkang made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: DPRK, China Cooperate in Economy and Technology
articles.content:
DPRK, China Cooperate in Economy and Technology
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- An agreement on the economic and technological cooperation between the governments of the DPRK and China was signed at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Saturday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Kim Yong Nam, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Il, alternate Politburo member and secretary of the C.C., WPK, Ju Yong Sik, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Song Gi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ku Pon Thae, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and officials concerned.
					
					 Present from the Chinese side were Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law of the Communist Party of China, Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Sun Zhengcai, secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CPC, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Qiu Yuanping, deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the C..C. the CPC, Zhang Zhijun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Chen Jian, vice-minister of Commerce, Chen Xi, deputy secretary of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the CPC, and Du Yuxin, deputy secretary of the Heilongjiang Provincial Committee of the CPC.
					
					 The agreement was inked by Ku Pon Thae and Chen Jian.

articles.title: Signal Achievements Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid on Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- At least 250 new structures sprang up and major industrial establishments fulfilled this year's plans for national economy ahead of schedule thanks to the high-pitched drive for a great surge waged by the whole party and state and all the people on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 All the fields and units have brought about these great innovations and leap forward by dashing ahead like the wind along the orbit of upswing. 
					
					 There appeared a lot of monumental structures demonstrating the vitality of the WPK's line of putting the national economy on Juche, modern and scientific basis.
					
					 The workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex completely succeeded in no-coke iron production method by use of Juche iron blast furnace and established a Juche iron production system based on high-speed deoxidization completely relying on brown coal abundant in the country. 
					
					 A modern vinalon factory went into operation at the February 8 Vinalon Complex to the greatest pleasure of the Korean people. The completion of a fiber band and drawing process made it possible to keep the production of quality vinalon threads and cloth going at a high rate.
					
					 The completion of a new large-scale anthracite gasification process at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex was followed by the replenishment of one more streamlined process. 
					
					 The Taegyedo tideland in the West Sea of Korea was reclaimed to obtain a new land equivalent to an arable land in a low-lying county. As a result, the contour of the west coastline of the country changed beyond recognition. 
					
					 Dams towered high at the Huichon Power Station now under construction thanks to its rapid progress. 
					
					 The workers of the Chollima Steel Complex built UHP electric arc furnace No. 2 and succeeded in its trial operation. They also built alloyed steel production base and technologically updated Revolving Furnace No. 3 at the Posan Iron Works and set up an oxygen plant with a capacity of 550 cubic meters, thus consolidating the foundation of production.
					
					 The workers of the Ryongsong Machine Complex completed a Songun iron foundry and Songun compressor shop based on the latest science and technology. 
					
					 Power bases went into operation one after another and Power Station No. 1 started operation earlier than scheduled at the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station construction site.
					
					 A great many modern factories and shops and Korean-style production processes were built in different fields and many objects including the E-Library of Kim Il Sung University were completed to be conducive to the development of the country's education, science and culture.
					
					 Many industrial establishments honored their yearly national economy quotas ahead of schedule.
					
					 A dynamic drive was waged in different fields and units of the national economy to put lots of industrial establishments across the country on a CNC basis. This resulted in establishment of computer-aided control system and placing production and construction on a new high scientific and IT basis and further intensifying the drive to study and introduce cutting-edge science and technology in a number of industrial establishments across the country.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid on Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid on Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid on the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and floral baskets placed before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Saturday on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Seen on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the ceremonies were senior officials of the party, the army and the state, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service persons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in the city.
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet were laid on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries and a floral basket in the joint name of the C.C., the WPK and the Central Military Commission of the WPK was placed before the main sculpture Victory of the tower.
					
					 Also laid on the cemeteries and the memorial tower were wreaths, floral baskets and bunches of flowers in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, KPA units and those of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and scientific, educational, cultural and art and public health and media institutions, party and power organs, industrial establishments and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to martyrs and paid high tribute to the servicepersons of the KPA.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the bust of  Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid by Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statue of President 
					Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Saturday by overseas Koreans who are staying in the homeland to participate in the celebrations marking the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Among them are the congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan, the General Association of Koreans in China, the International United Confederation of Koreans, the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., the Federation of Koreans in Australia, the Federation of Koreans in New Zealand, the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany and the advisor of the Federation of Koreans in Canada and other overseas Koreans. 
					
					 The participants placed floral baskets and bouquets before the statue of the President and paid tribute to him in humble reverence.

articles.title: DPRK Govt Gives Reception for Juche Idea Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Govt Gives Reception for Juche Idea Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea hosted a reception at the Chongryu Restaurant on Saturday in honor of the delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea in different countries and regions.
					
					 On hand were Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Ji Sung Chol, chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, and officials concerned.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his speech at the reception noted that the past 65 years covered by the WPK were shining annals in which the dignity and position of the country and the nation have exceptionally grown stronger and the might of Korean-style socialism was given into fullest play.
					
					 He extended thanks to followers of the Juche idea who have extended invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle for socialist construction and national reunification through the brisk study and dissemination of the Juche idea.
					
					 Vishwanath in the speech stressed that thanks to the leadership of the distinguished leader the WPK won the victory in the past Fatherland Liberation War and built socialism centered on the popular masses by embodying the great Juche idea, adding that General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK at its conference was a remarkable event which instilled great faith and courage into the Korean people and the world revolutionary parties and progressives.

articles.title: Gifts from Delegations of Juche Idea Organizations
articles.content:
Gifts from Delegations of Juche Idea Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from the delegations and delegates of the groups for the study of the Juche idea on a visit to the DPRK to celebrate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among them were Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, the delegation of the Spanish group for the study of the Juche idea led by Manuel Garcia Botaya, chief of the Paektusan Group, Thomas Losh, delegate of the Austrian Juche Idea Study Organization, the delegation of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea headed by its Chairman M. Qamrul Huda, the delegation of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre headed by Chairman Garib Newaz, the delegation of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions headed by General Secretary Mikhail Panchenko, the delegation of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea headed by Chairman Juha Kieksy, the delegation of the Association for the Study of the DPRK of Moscow State University in Russia headed by Chairman Pavel Reshakov, the far eastern regional delegation for the study o
					
					 f the Juche idea of Russia headed by Gennady Kulikov, the delegation of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea headed by Chairman Nikolai Polishk and the delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand headed by Chairman Songchit Pullarp.
					
					 The gifts were respectively handed to an official concerned by heads of the delegations and delegates of the groups for the study of the Juche idea on Oct. 8.

articles.title: Greetings from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Greetings from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were handed to an official concerned by Alexei Bartusov, military attache of the Russian embassy, on behalf of the corps on Saturday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from Japanese
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from Japanese
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter and a gift from Hiroji Kubota, vice-chairman for Asia of world photographers' group Magnum Photo and concurrently representative of its Tokyo branch, on Oct. 7 on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 He also received floral baskets from Tokushima Prefectural Citizens' Forum for Japan-Korea Friendship and its advisor Kiyomi Shinohara on Saturday on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He was presented with a floral basket on the same day by a Nagano delegation of Japan for supporting Korea's reunification on a visit to the DPRK on the same occasion.

articles.title: Juche Idea Organizations Here
articles.content:
Juche Idea Organizations Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Foreigners came here on Friday to attend the celebrations of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among them were Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, a Peruvian delegation for the study of the Juche idea led by Marcelo Javie, a delegation of the Polish Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea headed by Jacek Poniewierski, the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, and the family of Hu Zhenyi, a Chinese related to the anti－Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Also arriving was a delegation of the All-China Journalists Association led by Gao Juantang, chief of the Press Development Centre of the Jingji Ribao (Economic Daily).

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Arriving here on Saturday to take part in the celebrations of the 65th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea were the delegation of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil headed by its Secretary of the International Relations Nelson Chaves dos Santos, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party, Kanji Inoki, president of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan, and his party and the delegation of Kyodo News of Japan headed by Tomohide Okuno, executive director and managing editor of the News Department.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meeting Held
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) --A meeting of crewmen of foreign ships was held at Chongjin Port in North Hamgyong Province on October 8 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and celebrate the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 Present there were captains and crewmen of Panamanian-flagged ships and a Cambodian-flagged ship.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The Speakers said that President Kim Il Sung who laid a solid foundation for the party building long ago founded the Workers' Party of Korea after the country's liberation and wisely led it to creditably play its role as the revolutionary party which struck its roots among the popular masses.
					
					 They stressed that Kim Jong Il who has successfully carried forward the idea and cause of the President has strengthened and developed the WPK into an invincible party.
					
					Thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK will shatter the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK, honorably defend the gains of socialism and certainly achieve the cause of reunification, they added.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on October 6 to mark the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Present there on invitation were Kalashnikov, permanent member and secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and first vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the State Duma, Yajov, former defense minister of the Soviet Union, and personages of political parties, the government, the State Duma, institutions and organizations of Russia, including "A Just Russia", the Communist Party of Soviet Union, the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, the Communist Workers' Party of Russia-Revolutionary Communist Party, the Foreign Ministry, the Defense Ministry, the Ministry of Regional Development, the Ministry of Economic Development, the Ministry of Culture, the Academy of Sciences, the Moscow City Government and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK. 
					
					 Charge d'Affaires ad Interim O Sung Ho and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow were on hand. 
					
					The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length portrait of President 
						Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. Then they looked around photos introducing the WPK's history of victory and glory.
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 O Sung Ho said that the foundation of the WPK by Kim Il Sung 65 years ago was an event of historical significance in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. He referred to the fact that under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the army and people of the DPRK have achieved historic victory and successes in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 It is the boundless honor and happiness of the WPK, the army and people of the DPRK to have reelected Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK, he stressed. 
					
					 He expressed the will to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in the future, too.
					
					 Kalashnikov said that the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung has always discharged its role as the guide in accelerating socialist construction, increasing the national defence capability and achieving the reunification of the country over the past years. 
					
					 We once again extend heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK at its Conference, he said.
					
					 He expressed confidence that the friendly and cooperative relations between the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Workers' Party of Korea and between the two countries would further develop and the support and solidarity between the two parties would be strengthened.

articles.title: WPK Enjoys Public Confidence
articles.content:
WPK Enjoys Public Confidence
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- October 10 is the anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people.
					 In its 65-year-long history intertwined with severe trials, the WPK, with its roots struck deep in the masses, has performed undying feats in developing the revolution and achieving the independence of the popular masses, while enjoying their absolute support and trust and demonstrating its might as an invincible party.
					
					 The Korean people fully entrust their destiny and future to the WPK, calling it the mother, a result which has been brought by the party's popular politics.
					
					 From the outset, the WPK, prompted by the motto of believing the people as in heaven, has pursued politics based on love for and trust in the people.
					
					 Although the country was in hard time at the end of the last century, the WPK consistently pursued such popular policies as compulsory free education system and free medical care. When a power station project was launched, it took a measure to build dwelling houses for several thousand families to evacuate them from the construction site.
					
					 An era of prosperity has been opened up in the country under the wise leadership of the WPK, which spares nothing for the people's wellbeing with the improvement of their living as the supreme principle in its activities. 
					
					 In Korea the WPK and the people are in perfect harmony, the party devotedly serving the people and the latter supporting the former with heroic merits.

articles.title: Greetings from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Greetings from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings from Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, on October 4.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend congratulations to you on your reelection as general secretary of the WPK and wish you success in your responsible work and happiness. 
					
					 I, availing myself of this opportunity, express solidarity with the just cause of the Korean nation for independent and peaceful reunification and reaffirm the will to steadily boost the traditional fraternal relations between the two countries.

articles.title: S. Korean Defense Minister's Anti-DPRK Outbursts Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Defense Minister's Anti-DPRK Outbursts Flayed
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Minister of Defense of south Korea Kim Thae Yong made public a plan for "psychological warfare against the north" at an administrative inspection meeting of the Defense Committee of the puppet National Assembly on Oct. 5.
					 According to him, the puppet military is in the process of changing the mode of anti-DPRK broadcasting and making preparations for an operation to scatter radios in the areas of the DPRK. He went the lengths of blustering that they would start loud-speaker broadcasting and scatter copies of anti-DPRK leaflets the moment it is confirmed as a political judgment to pressurize the north.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Saturday observes:
					
					 What he uttered is a remark of treachery challenging the people's mind-set as it was bellicose outburst of vitiating the atmosphere of dialogue.
					
					 The "psychological warfare against the north" means a war as it runs counter to the bilateral military agreement reached according to the north-south declaration.
					
					 Kim Thae Yong cried out for preparations for the psychological warfare and its implementation and the like. This is little different from a declaration that it would launch a war when an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that his outbursts was not his own view or a slip of tongue but reflected the ruling forces' "military policy toward the north".
					
					 Dialogue can never go with war.
					
					 If the south Korean conservative authorities are truly interested in dialogue and cooperation with the fellow countrymen, they should fire such hideous confrontational maniac as Kim Thae Yong and come out for the north-south dialogue with sincerity.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Barbarism Exposed by S. Korean
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Barbarism Exposed by S. Korean
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Investigating Damage Done by Japan through Forcible Mobilization during Resistance against It and Supporting Victims of Forcible Mobilization Abroad, Etc.  in south Korea on October 5 laid bare the barbarous acts committed by the Japanese imperialist aggression forces against Koreans.
					 According to a report on the truth probed by the organization, the Japanese imperialist aggression forces took at least 800-1,000 Koreans to an archipelago southeast of Marshall Islands in the Pacific and drove them to the construction of military facilities including airfields early in 1942.
					
					 When a supply route had been cut off by air raids of U.S. forces since June of 1944, the Japanese imperialist aggression forces killed Koreans to feed their troops with their flesh and forced Koreans whom they had taken away to eat human flesh, advertising it as whale meat.
					
					 When groups of Koreans rose up in resistance, upon learning about this cannibalism, the Japanese imperialist aggression forces encircled islands with troops armed with machine guns and killed many of them in cold blood.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on October 7 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his  reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and chairman of the National Rights Committee, Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and chairman of the Rights and Welfare Committee, Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman and director general of the General Affairs Department of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon and other officials, compatriots and teachers of schools at different levels.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his report that the reelection of Kim Jong Il to the top post of the WPK was a great event of the country and the nation and a noteworthy event in the human history of politics.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has devoted all to the prosperity of the country and the nation and the victory of the cause of Juche for years and developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and an invincible revolutionary party, he stressed.
					
					 The DPRK has powerfully demonstrated the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's nation before the whole world thanks to the precious fruition of the seasoned and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Having Kim Jong Il at the top post of the revolution, Chongryon could firmly defend itself, courageously frustrating the frantic anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon moves of the reactionary forces inside and outside Japan and dynamically advance along the road of patriotism under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he noted.
					
					 He called on the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan to usher in a new heyday in the movement of Koreans in Japan, cherishing the conviction of sure victory that they are sure to emerge victorious when they are led by Kim Jong Il, 
					
					 Then, speeches were made.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee to Kim Jong Il was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Group for Juche and Songun Idea Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Group for Juche and Songun Idea Formed in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Blagobeshensk, Russia, group for the study of the Juche idea and Songun idea was formed.
					 An inaugural ceremony took place at Blagobeshensk State                       University of Education in Amur Region on September 26.
					
					A. I. Donchenko was elected chief of the group at the ceremony.
					
					Speakers said at the ceremony that the DPRK, guided by the Juche idea founded by President
						 Kim Il Sung, has played a great role in developing the world's history.
					
					 The Juche idea has been steadily developed in depth and widely studied and disseminated in many countries in Europe, Asia, Africa and Latin America thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il, they noted.
					
					 The DPRK is triumphantly advancing the cause of building a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea, they said, expressing belief that the Korean people would certainly fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: DR Congo Figure Praises WPK
articles.content:
DR Congo Figure Praises WPK
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, released a statement on Sept. 30 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The WPK has performed feats to always go down in the history for the freedom and happiness of the people and the development and progress of the country, hewing a long and arduous path under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The protracted and glorious struggle waged under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung made it possible for the WPK to command the support and absolute trust of the people as a staff of the revolution.
					
					 The recent Conference of the WPK reelected General Secretary Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK. It was a manifestation of all the Korean people's boundless trust and absolute support to him and their unwavering will to carry forward generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the WPK advancing under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea under the Songun leadership of  Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Observed
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Observed
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Russia on Oct. 5 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and commemorate its 65th birthday.
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were works of President  Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos on the theme of "Under the Guidance of the WPK".
					
					 Mozgovoi, acting first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Soviet Union, delivered a report at the meeting to be followed by speeches by Yuri Vanin, first vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, and other figures.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK was the great honor and happiness of the members of the Communist Party of Soviet Union and other world progressives and warmly congratulated him on his reelection.
					
					 They recalled that the President gave an origin to the construction of a revolutionary party of Juche type during the hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, laid an organizational and ideological foundation for founding the party and founded the WPK on its basis.
					
					 The genuine Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses has grown strong under the wise leadership of the WPK founded by the President and led by Kim Jong Il, they said.
					
					 They expressed the belief that the Korean people would fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 without fail under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meeting.
					
					 A meeting was held in Switzerland, a lecture given  in Sweden, a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened with due ceremony in Bulgaria and a film show was held in Peru on Sept. 25 and 30 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal Supported by Switzerland
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal Supported by Switzerland
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on September 27 on the occasions of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the third anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said that the said proposal is a fair and aboveboard and realistic proposal to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 To this end it is necessary to force the U.S. forces to withdraw from south Korea and the south Korean authorities should recognize the principle of independence, neutrality and non-alignment set forth in the proposal.
					
					 The inter-Korean cooperation and detente totally collapsed owing to the Lee Myung Bak group, pro-American conservative forces of south Korea, but it can never arrest the struggle of the Korean people to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of "By our nation itself", it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il’s Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il’s Work Off Press in Russia
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Oct. 4.
					The work, published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), clarifies the five-point policy of the great national unity which serves as highly important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Mexican Organizations Release Bulletin
articles.content:
Mexican Organizations Release Bulletin
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism and the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly released a special bulletin "Great Comrade Kim Jong Il reelected as general secretary of the WPK--the Conference of the WPK", congratulating Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK.
					 The bulletin carried his photograph.
					
					 An article of the bulletin noted that it is the highest honor and happiness of millions of party members, servicepersons and the people of the DPRK and a great auspicious event of the country and the nation that Kim Jong Il was reelected to the top post of the WPK, the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 His reelection was an expression of the absolute support and trust of all the party members, servicepersons and people of the DPRK in him, the bulletin said, adding:
					
					 It also marked a great political event which strikingly demonstrated the unshakable faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to resolutely protect and glorify the immortal revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause under the tested and experienced leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il visita Teatro Nacional de Drama y casas de artistas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il visita Teatro Nacional de Drama y casas de artistas
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el nuevamente construido Teatro Nacional de Drama y las viviendas de los artistas.
					 Recorrio primero el nuevo Teatro Nacional de Drama.
					
					 El teatro facilita todas las condiciones necesarias a la creacion artistica, las funciones y el disfrute de estas, incluyendo la graderia de mas de 620 asientos, los aparatos ultramodernos de sonido e iluminacion, varias salas de ejercicio y maquillaje, el edificio auxiliar y las instalaciones de servicio publico.
					
					 El Dirigente recorrio el interior y exterior del teatro informandose en detalles del estado de construccion.
					
					 Este teatro nuevamente construido es perfecto tanto en la estructura interna como en el nivel de ejecucion y tiene el contenido y la forma de magnifico centro de cultura y arte, dijo y expreso agradecimiento a los constructores militares que construyeron excelentemente este teatro de eterna duracion, evaluando altamente sus meritos.
					
					 Es un milagro realmente sorprendente la construccion de este orgulloso y moderno teatro en 4 meses y pico, senalo y enfatizo que este exito asombrante deviene la manifestacion fehaciente del infinito poderio espiritual de los militares coreanos, creadores del espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					 El Teatro Nacional de Drama, que combina armoniosamente la belleza clasica nacional con la moderna y la hermosura, la majestuosidad y la fineza, deviene el excelente centro cultural a la altura del nuevo siglo, dijo y se mostro muy alegre de poder legar a las generaciones venideras otro valioso patrimonio.
					
					 El Dirigente presento las tareas que se presentan en la administracion del teatro.
					
					 Seguidamente, el Dirigente visito las casas nuevamente construidas a la ribera del rio Taedong adonde se mudaron hace poco los artistas.
					
					 Se entero en detalles del estado de construccion recorriendo por varias horas el exterior y el interior de las viviendas.
					
					 Subrayo que estas viviendas devienen las ejemplares en que todo el pueblo coreano vivira cuando fuera construida la gran potencia prospera.
					
					 Estas casas han sido construidas con buen diseno y en el maximo nivel de ejecucion, senalo y agradecio a los constructores militares, que edificaron en un corto tiempo estas viviendas ideales, apreciando mucho sus meritos.
					
					 El Dirigente visito las familias de los artistas del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional Paek Sung Ran, Choe Kum Hyang y Kim Chol Jin y el director del conjunto Ri Ji Yong, quienes se mudaron recientemente.
					
					 Tras felicitar la mudanza a la nueva casa y departir cordialmente con ellos, averiguo con afecto paternal todos los detalles de la vida y les regalo como recuerdo los utensilios domesticos.
					
					 Reconocio los esfuerzos de ellos diciendo que los artistas coreanos infinitamente fieles al partido y al lider son fidedignos soldados del frente ideologico que estimulan energicamente a las masas a la materializacion de las politicas del partido.
					
					 Ahora, en el fragor del gran auge se llevan a la realidad el ideal y la aspiracion que abriga de siglo en siglo nuestro pueblo, asevero y continuo que este evento conmovedor de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo de Corea esta mostrando a la vista el maravilloso futuro de la gran potencia prospera del Juche que se levantara majestuosamente en este territorio.
					
					 Ese dia, el Dirigente recorrio las avenidas capitalinas, que se cambian de dia en dia, y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en acondicionar con mas elegancia la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					 La construccion de viviendas es un asunto muy importante para solucionar el problema de vida del pueblo, menciono y enfatizo que la tarea inmediata es terminar en un plazo corto en la ciudad de Pyongyang la construccion de las viviendas modernas para 100 mil familias, iguales con las edificadas en el reparto Mansudae y las nuevas de los artistas.
					
					 Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que todos los constructores de la capital volveran a exaltar a todo el mundo el impetu revolucionario del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, continuadores de la gran historia y tradiciones, al crear nuevos milagros en la construccion de la capital en el nuevo siglo. 
					
					 En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico (BP) del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y Ri Yong Ho, los miembros del BP del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Ju Sang Song y Hong Sok Hyong, los miembros suplentes del BP del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Thae Nam, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, U Tong Chuk, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Chang Sop y Mun Kyong Dok.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Hu Jintao.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, envio las calidas felicitaciones al CC del PTC en representacion del CC del PCCh y en mi nombre.
					
					El PTC fundado por el gran Lider, Presidente   Kim Il Sung, tiene la gloriosa tradicion revolucionaria.
					
					Durante largo tiempo, el PTC logro incesantes exitos que merecen la atencion en la causa de la revolucion y la construccion del socialismo al dirigir al pueblo coreano superando las dificultades y luchando tenazmente. 
					
					Durante unos anos pasados, en acato al legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung el PTC encabezado por el Secretario General Kim Jong Il, al dirigir al pueblo,  logro los exitos alegres en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion del socialismo al estilo coreano buscando de manera continua y activamente el camino de desarrollo conveniente a la realidad de Corea.
					
					Como vecinos amistosos, camaradas intimos y amigos verdaderos, deseamos de todo corazon que bajo la direccion del PTC encabezado por el Secretario General Kim Jong Il, el pueblo coreano logre incesantemente nuevos y mayores exitos en la trayectoria historica de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					En los ultimos anos, gracias a la gran atencion de las partes bilaterales, China y Corea, y los esfuerzos comunes de los pueblos de ambos paises, las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea se han consolidado y desarrollado incesantemente y hicieron aporte importante a promover la causa de construccion del socialismo de los dos paises.
					
					El PCCh da suma importancia a la tradicional amistad China-Corea y presenta como orientacion invariable consolidar y desarrollar incesantemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea.
					
					Nos esforzaremos en comun con la parte coreana por hacer que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea suban constantemente al nuevo nivel mas alto.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon que el PTC se desarrolle constantemente y la amistad China-Corea se transmita de generacion en generacion.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion del PCCh
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion del PCCh
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- Llego este sabado a esta capital la delegacion del Partido Comunista de China encabezada por el miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del Comite Central y secretario de la Comision Central de Politicas y Ley del PCCh, Zhou Yongkang, para realizar una visita oficial y de amistad a Corea cumplimentando la invitacion del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					La delegacion fue recibida en el aeropuerto por Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, y otros funcionarios coreanos.

articles.title: Zhou Yongkang publica discurso escrito de llegada a Pyongyang
articles.content:
Zhou Yongkang publica discurso escrito de llegada a Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- Zhou Yongkang, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del Comite Central y secretario de la Comision Central de Politicas y Ley del Partido Comunista de China, hizo publico el dia 9 en el aeropuerto el discurso escrito de llegada a Pyongyang.
					 Durante los 65 anos pasados, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, al poner de manifiesto el espiritu de autoconfianza y tenaz lucha en el proceso de dirigir al pueblo coreano, supero las dificultades multiples, realizo la soberania del pais y la liberacion del pueblo y logro incesantemente los exitos asombrantes en el cumplimiento de la causa de la construccion del socialismo al estilo coreano, dijo y continuo:
					
					 La Conferencia del PTC efectuada exitosamente hace poco eligio el supremo organo directivo y volvio a ratificar al camarada Kim Jong Il en el cargo cimero de Secretario General del  PTC.
					
					  Expreso la confianza de que bajo la direccion del Dirigente, el PTC, al dirigir al pueblo coreano, abrira la incesante y nueva coyuntura y lograra exitos en las labores para construir el Estado prospero, realizar la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria y mejorar las relaciones exteriores.
					
					  Ofrecer mayor felicidad a los pueblos de los dos paises consolidando y desarrollando incesantemente la tradicional amistad China-Corea deviene nuestra mision honrosa y sagrada y firme orientacion comun, apunto.
					
					  Gracias a la gran atencion de los maximos dirigentes de ambas partes y los incansables esfuerzos de los dos partidos, dos paises y dos pueblos, las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea traeran el futuro mas hermoso, destaco.
					
					  Manifesto conviccion de que  la presente visita estrechara mas el sentimiento amistoso entre los dos partidos, dos paises y dos pueblos y promovera el desarrollo profundo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre China y Corea.

articles.title: Delegacion del PCCh rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Delegacion del PCCh rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- La delegacion del Partido Comunista de China presidida por el miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del Comite Central y secretario de la Comision Central de Politicas y Ley del PCCh, Zhou Yongkang, rindio homenaje el dia 9 al Presidente Kim Il Sung en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					 La acompanaron el miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Il, y el embajador chino en Corea Liu Hongcai.
					
					 Ante la estatua de pie del Presidente fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre de la delegacion china.
					
					Los participantes rindieron tributo al Presidente quien desarrollo el PTC como el invencible partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano y de acero e hizo aporte inmortal al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-China y al cumplimiento de la causa por la realizacion de la independencia en el mundo entero. 
					
					Zhou Yongkang dejo letras en el libro de visitas.

articles.title: Ofrenda floral de delegacion del PCCh ante Monumento a la Amistad
articles.content:
Ofrenda floral de delegacion del PCCh ante Monumento a la Amistad
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- La delegacion del Partido Comunista de China encabezada por el miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del Comite Central y secretario de la Comision Central de Politicas y Ley del PCCh, Zhou Yongkang, de visita en Corea, deposito el dia 9 la ofrenda floral ante el Monumento a la Amistad.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Song Nam, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, el vicecanciller Kim Song Gi y otros funcionarios coreanos, el embajador chino Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica china en Corea.
					
					 Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria a los martires del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino quienes habian combatido valientemente en el frente coreano y recorrieron el monumento.
					
					 Zhou Yongkang dejo letras en el libro de visitas.

articles.title: Tiene lugar velada de salvas por 65o aniversario del PTC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar velada de salvas por 65o aniversario del PTC
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 por la noche en esta capital la velada de fuegos artificiales en conmemoracion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					 Todas las partes capitalinas, incluyendo la ribera  del rio Taedong y la zona de Mangyongdae, de donde se divisan el Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido y el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Mangyongdae, sedes del acto de salvas, estaban repletas de los habitantes congregados para ver los fuegos artificiales que adornaran hermosamente el cielo nocturno de octubre.
					
					 Hicieron uso de la palabra Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC.
					
					 Los oradores dijeron que esta velada es el festival glorioso que glorifica la larga historia y las inmortales hazanas del partido y el gran cuadro de la victoria que eleva mas el orgullo y la dignidad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que crean nuevos prodigios y proezas de la epoca del Songun como descendientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Subrayaron que la velada se efectua con las modernas salvas coreanas desarrolladas de modo original en lo figurativo y artistico conforme a los sentimientos y la idiosincrasia del pueblo coreano.
					
					 Mientras repercutian las canciones "Viva el Partido del Trabajo de Corea" y "Bajo la bandera del Partido", se lanzaron sucesivamente los fuegos artificiales en el cielo sobre los lugares arriba mencionados adornando hermosamente el cielo nocturno de la capital.
					
					 En reflejo de la maxima gloria que rinden el ejercito y el pueblo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los cohetes escenificaron en el cielo un panorama de mil maravillas.
					
					 Al son de las canciones "Cantamos del partido", "El regazo del partido es nuestra casa", "El Partido del Trabajo es nuestro orientador" y otras, subieron vertiginosamente al firmamento muchos cohetes describiendo el emblema del PTC.
					
					 Las nubes de fuegos artificiales, que aparecian sucesivamente en el extenso cielo como si mostraran el alto nivel figurativo y artistico de cohetes coreanos, llevaron al climax el ambiente de la velada.
					
					 Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion los cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los delegados a los actos festivos centrales del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder y de las entidades de masas, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los heroes, las personas relacionadas con la Lucha Revolucionaria Antijaponesa, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios, los benemeritos y los trabajadores.
					
					 Tambien, fueron invitados el grupo de felicitacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon y otros grupos de los coreanos radicados en varias regiones del mundo, los miembros de las delegaciones y grupos de visita, el representante de la Sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, y las delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche, asi como los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, los miembros del cuerpo de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros.

articles.title: ATCC informa exitos alcanzados en ocasion del 65o aniversario de PTC
articles.content:
ATCC informa exitos alcanzados en ocasion del 65o aniversario de PTC
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- En los dias, en que todo el partido, todo el pais y todo el pueblo han venido produciendo un gran auge para acoger el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, mas de 250 establecimientos se construyeron nuevamente e importantes fabricas y empresas han cumplido con adelanto el plan anual de economia nacional.
					Todos los sectores y unidades han alcanzado grandes exitos avanzando a galopes por la orbita ascendente.
					
					Se han levantado las creaciones que manifiestan la vitalidad de la linea del partido de realizar la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de la economia nacional.
					
					Los obreros del Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek perfeccionaron con exito el metodo de fundicion de hierro sin coque en el alto horno de acero Juche y establecieron el sistema de produccion de este acero segun la reaccion de reduccion rapida que utiliza en cien por ciento el lignito abundante en el pais.
					
					Se ha inaugurado la moderna fabrica de vinalon en el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y se ha perfeccionado el proceso de la fibra en cinta y el estiramiento, de modo que se normalizara en un alto nivel la produccion de hilos y telas de vinalon de buena calidad.
					
					El Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung quedo acondicionado nuevamente el proceso de gasificacion de la antracita de gran tamano y adicionado un nuevo proceso en cadena.
					
					Las marismas Taegyedo roturadas en el pleno Mar Oeste, que equivalen a la superficie del terreno cultivable de un distrito entero en la zona llana, modificaron el mapa de la patria.
					
					Como resultado del impulso dinamico de la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon, fueron levantados los diques gigantescos. 
					
					Los obreros del Complejo de Acero Chollima construyeron el horno electrico UHP no.2 que ya paso la prueba. Y al completar la construccion de la base de produccion de acero de aleacion y la reconstruccion del horno giratorio no 3. de la Fundicion de Hierro de Posan e instalar el separador de oxigeno de 550 metros cubicos, consolidaron mas la base de produccion.
					
					Los obreros del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong edificaron la fabrica de hierro fundido Songun y el taller de compresor Songun en el nivel super-sofisticado. 
					
					Han sido inauguradas sucesivamente las bases energeticas y la planta no. 1 de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Songun de Paektusan entrara pronto en funcionamiento antes de la fecha prevista.
					
					Se han construido en varias ramas modernas fabricas y talleres y muchos procesos productivos al estilo coreano.
					
					Igualmente, se han inaugurado la biblioteca electronica de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y otros establecimientos que contribuiran al desarrollo de la educacion, la ciencia y la cultura del pais. 
					
					Ademas, muchas fabricas y empresas sobrecumplieron con antelacion el plan anual de economia nacional.
					
					En todos los sectores y todas las unidades de la economia nacional se libro dinamicamente la labor para introducir la tecnologia CNC.
					
					De esta manera, en muchas fabricas y empresas a lo largo del pais se ha elevado a la etapa mas alta el nivel de cientifizacion e informatizacion de la produccion y la construccion mediante el establecimiento del sistema de control computarizado y se ha dinamizado mas que nunca la campana para investigar y aplicar la ciencia y tecnica de punta.
